external_games.name: Strange Terror from Beyond the Stars!
Strange Terror From Beyond The Stars!

name: Strange Terror from Beyond the Stars!
summary:
There were twenty crew members at the beginning of the galactic expedition of 1967, but only five remain in the aftermath of the strange terror...

Witness a truely horrifying sci-fi game, with a 60s aesthetic. Each time you play, you'll go up against one of seventeen monsters, each with their own special abilities. Including special guests from iconic movies and random monstrosities!

This game was directed by none other than Dave Microwaves Games! A semi known game developer. Featuring voice actors such as JayskiBean, who plays the brave soul who is desperately trying to escape the ship. NathanBlakeGames, who plays the pilot, warning the player of impending doom. And TheGameSalmon, who plays the role of the General Maintenance Worker stuck in a closet...

Will you be able to survive playing through this entire film- erm, game?
